verses.verse: Do we begin<WG756> again<WG3825> to commend<WG4921> ourselves?<WG1438> or<WG1508> need<WG5535> we, as<WG5613> some<WG5100> others, epistles<WG1992> of commendation<WG4956> to<WG4314> you,<WG5209> or<WG2228> letters of commendation<WG4956> from<WG1537> you?<WG5216>
Ye <WG5210> are<WG2075> our<WG2257> epistle<WG1992> written<WG1449> in<WG1722> our<WG2257> hearts,<WG2588> known<WG1097> and<WG2532> read<WG314> of<WG5259> all<WG3956> men: <WG444>

Forasmuch as ye are manifestly declared<WG5319> to<WG3754> be<WG2075> the epistle<WG1992> of Christ<WG5547> ministered<WG1247> by<WG5259> us,<WG2257> written<WG1449> not<WG3756> with ink,<WG3188> but<WG235> with the Spirit<WG4151> of the living<WG2198> God;<WG2316> not<WG3756> in<WG1722> tables<WG4109> of stone,<WG3035> but<WG235> in<WG1722> fleshy<WG4560> tables<WG4109> of the heart.<WG2588>
And <WG1161> such<WG5108> trust<WG4006> have<WG2192> we through<WG1223> Christ<WG5547> to<WG4314> God-ward: <WG2316>

Not <WG3756> that<WG3754> we are<WG2070> sufficient<WG2425> of<WG575> ourselves<WG1438> to think<WG3049> any thing<WG5100> as<WG5613> of<WG1537> ourselves;<WG1438> but<WG235> our<WG2257> sufficiency<WG2426> is of<WG1537> God;<WG2316>

Who <WG3739> also<WG2532> hath made us able<WG2427> <WG2248> ministers<WG1249> of the new<WG2537> testament;<WG1242> not<WG3756> of the letter,<WG1121> but<WG235> of the spirit:<WG4151> for<WG1063> the<WG3588> letter<WG1121> killeth,<WG615> but<WG1161> the<WG3588> spirit<WG4151> giveth life.<WG2227>

But <WG1161> if<WG1487> the<WG3588> ministration<WG1248> of death,<WG2288> written<WG1722> <WG1121> and engraven<WG1795> in<WG1722> stones,<WG3037> was<WG1096> glorious,<WG1722> <WG1391> so that<WG5620> the<WG3588> children<WG5207> of Israel<WG2474> could<WG1410> not<WG3361> steadfastly<WG816> behold<WG1519> the<WG3588> face<WG4383> of Moses<WG3475> for<WG1223> the<WG3588> glory<WG1391> of his<WG846> countenance;<WG4383> which glory was to be done away: <WG2673>
How <WG4459> shall not<WG3780> the<WG3588> ministration<WG1248> of the<WG3588> spirit<WG4151> be<WG2071> rather<WG3123> glorious?<WG1722> <WG1391>

For <WG1063> if<WG1487> the<WG3588> ministration<WG1248> of condemnation<WG2633> be glory,<WG1391> much<WG4183> more<WG3123> doth the<WG3588> ministration<WG1248> of righteousness<WG1343> exceed<WG4052> in<WG1722> glory.<WG1391>

For <WG1063> even<WG2532> that which was made glorious<WG1392> had no glory<WG1392> <WG3761> in<WG1722> this<WG5129> respect,<WG3313> by reason of<WG1752> the<WG3588> glory<WG1391> that excelleth.<WG5235>
For <WG1063> if<WG1487> that which is done away<WG2673> was glorious,<WG1223> <WG1391> much<WG4183> more<WG3123> that which remaineth<WG3306> is glorious.<WG1722> <WG1391>
Seeing then<WG3767> that we have<WG2192> such<WG5108> hope,<WG1680> we use<WG5530> great<WG4183> plainness of speech: <WG3954>

And <WG2532> not<WG3756> as<WG2509> Moses,<WG3475> which put<WG5087> a veil<WG2571> over<WG1909> his<WG1438> face,<WG4383> that the<WG3588> children<WG5207> of Israel<WG2474> could not<WG3361> steadfastly look<WG816> to<WG1519> the<WG3588> end<WG5056> of that which is abolished: <WG2673>

But <WG235> their<WG846> minds<WG3540> were blinded:<WG4456> for<WG1063> until<WG891> this day<WG4594> remaineth<WG3306> the<WG3588> same<WG846> veil<WG2571> untaken away<WG343> <WG3361> in<WG1909> the<WG3588> reading<WG320> of the<WG3588> old<WG3820> testament;<WG1242> which<WG3748> veil is done away<WG2673> in<WG1722> Christ.<WG5547>
But <WG235> even unto<WG2193> this day,<WG4594> when<WG2259> Moses<WG3475> is read,<WG314> the veil<WG2571> is<WG2749> upon<WG1909> their<WG846> heart.<WG2588>
Nevertheless <WG1161> when<WG2259> <WG302> it shall turn<WG1994> to<WG4314> the Lord,<WG2962> the<WG3588> veil<WG2571> shall be taken away.<WG4014>
Now <WG1161> the<WG3588> Lord<WG2962> is<WG2076> that Spirit:<WG4151> and<WG1161> where<WG3757> the<WG3588> Spirit<WG4151> of the Lord<WG2962> is, there<WG1563> is liberty.<WG1657>

But <WG1161> we<WG2249> all,<WG3956> with open<WG343> face<WG4383> beholding as in a glass<WG2734> the<WG3588> glory<WG1391> of the Lord,<WG2962> are changed<WG3339> into the<WG3588> same<WG846> image<WG1504> from<WG575> glory<WG1391> to<WG1519> glory,<WG1391> even as<WG2509> by<WG575> the Spirit<WG4151> of the Lord.<WG2962>
